body_html:
Oh, this is maybe bazel stripping the environment variables? http://www.bazel.io/docs/designs/2016/06/02/sandboxing.html#handling-of-environment-variables

Which means that the problem is maybe that none of the --linkopts or linkopt on targets get to passed to crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc?

body:
Oh, this is maybe bazel stripping the environment variables? http://www.bazel.io/docs/designs/2016/06/02/sandboxing.html#handling-of-environment-variables

Which means that the problem is maybe that none of the `--linkopts` or `linkopt` on targets get to passed to `crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc`?
